job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: 5+ years designing software and coding professionallyComputer Science degree preferredAn interest in the blockchain and cryptocurrency spaceProficient with JavaProficient with a scripting language such as Python, Nodejs and/or PHPComfortable and proficient in a Linux terminal is requiredExperience building and testing microservices with REST, preferably in JavaCapable of taking a new feature from the software design stage, through the development process, and ship it to productionBroad knowledge of SQL and relational database designSome knowledge of the mechanics of applied cryptography including hashing, randomization, public-key encryption, symmetric encryption, and elliptic curves
